TopicTitle: Post YOUR kerman name and quote here.

Articles.Content:
"Watch the wing, Watch the wing, Watch the wing!"

-Forgotten kerbal, MIA

Shoot another favorite-

"Oh dear kraken yes!"

-An engineer, assigned to the J███-██ Super-heavy lift rocket.

Edited April 29, 2021 by Wizard Kerbal

Dacott Kerman,

”hey is that a docking port?” -Dacott Kerman while “litho braking” with a space station docking port at 200 m/s.
Shepley, are you sure this is a good idea? -The last recorded words of Alex Kerman

Stay on target, STAY ON TARGET!!! OH **** I HIT SOMETH—

-unidentified Kerbal rebel while trying to fly under the level 2 R&D bridge.
